Articles.Content:
Hi, this is my feeble attempt of building a replica of the Apollo/Noyez link up. I know it is not exactly a similar design, but i used parts that are similar to the parts in the diagram below. the packs I used are the probodobodyne (new one) Noyez and some others (I will edit this post once i have found them out. the staging is all screwed up where i attempted to adjust it.

If any mod makers want to have a go at making parts for this, then feel free to ask for the current parts and i will find them out asap!!!

hey stop what your doing and read this imeadetly

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6983.0
Oops!!!!!!!!!!!!! I didnt know someone was making a pack of parts for this!!!!!!!! I look like a complete idiot now

I was just reading that when NASA and the Soviet Space Program did this mission, after the Apollo craft disconnected they had an accident where the cre cabin filled with fuel and nearly killed the crew because it was so toxic.

Accident = They forgot to run off RCS.

Almost killed = Lightheadedness and one unconsciousness due to RCS fuel filling cabin..

So yeah, not fun.

lets try that

ooooh i have good idea there should be emergency scenarios i the future KSP

Oops!!!!!!!!!!!!! I didnt know someone was making a pack of parts for this!!!!!!!! I look like a complete idiot now

Believe me, you don\'t look like an idiot.
